name: Minute By Minute
content: 我知道你已经陷入了爱河
Stuck around while my heart played dumb
在我的心还无法言语时 留下来吧
Kept holding on
不要放手
When l I open up to the light of day
当我睁开眼迎接一天的到来
I just hope that l see you****ce
我只希望我能看见你的脸
Kept holding on
不要放手
So don t walk away don t walk away now
现在不要离开
现在我就在这呢 和你一起
Keep holding on keep holding on
不要放手
Minute by minute minute by minute
每一分钟 每一分钟
I m falling in I m falling deeper
我都陷得更深 更深
Each step I take I m getting closer
我走出的每一步 都在朝你靠近
It won t be long it won't be long
就快到了
Minute by minute minute by minute
每一分钟 每一分钟
我可以与你将心比心
I m inching over making room for two
我正在努力制造只属于我们的空间
Keep holding on
不要放手
I started of thinking this ain t me
我变得不像自己了
但我已经为你换了方向因为我终于发现了
I want you more
我更加渴望拥有你了
Minute by minute minute by minute
每一分钟 每一分钟
So don t walk away don t walk away now
所以现在不要离开 不要离开
现在我就在这呢 和你一起
Keep holding on keep holding on
不要放手
Minute by minute minute by minute
每一分钟 每一分钟
I m falling in I m falling deeper
我都陷得更深
Each step I take I m getting closer
我走出的每一步 都在朝你靠近
It won t be long it won't be long
我就快到了
Minute by minute minute by minute
每一分钟 每一分钟
Love just turns us into fools
爱让我们变成了傻瓜
That's right look at me with you
说的对啊 看看和你在一起的我
Couldn t see what you always knew
并不懂那些你总是很明白的东西
无论我朝哪儿走 那必须是你之所向
So don t walk away don t walk away now
所以现在不要离开
现在我就在这呢 和你一起
Keep holding on keep holding on
不要放手 坚持下去
Minute by minute minute by minute
每一分钟 每一分钟
I m falling in I m falling deeper
我都陷得更深
Each step I take I m getting closer
我踏出的每一步 都在朝着你靠近
It won t be long it won't be long
我就快到了
Minute by minute minute by minute
每一分钟 每一分钟
